titleStmt.title: Cupids revenge. The captive lover once got free did triumph in his liberty, But storming Cupids mighty power, he did his freedom soon devour. Tune, Now, now the fight's done.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F[rancis]. Cole, T[homas]. Vere, J[ohn]. Wright, J[ohn]. Clark, W[illiam]. Thackery: T[homas]. Passenger,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Now, now you blind boy I you clearly deny ..."
Place, date of publication, and publisher's names from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
